updated_at.description: The date and time when the segment was last updated

created_at.description: The date and time when the segment was created

name.description: Name or title of the segment

ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier for the ad account associated with the segment

organization_id.description: Unique identifier for the organization to which the segment belongs

status.description: Current status of the segment (e.g., active, inactive)

targetable_status.description: Status indicating whether the segment can be targeted in marketing campaigns

upload_status.description: Status of the segment upload process (e.g., pending, completed)

source_type.description: Type of the source data used to create the segment

retention_in_days.description: Number of days for which the segment data is retained

approximate_number_users.description: Approximate number of users within the segment

visible_to.description: Visibility setting for the segment, determining who can access it
